title: Private room in guesthouse in Kecamatan Kuta, Indonesia
description:
## About this space

Welcome to Room 2, the perfect space for those looking for a comfortable and functional room with a touch of luxury.

This room features a unique double floor mezzanine design, providing a separate private working area and a cozy relaxing area downstairs, bedroom above and close to the AC. The spacious wardrobe provides ample storage for all your belongings, ensuring a clutter-free stay
cancellationPolicy: 48 hours after booking: Full refund: Get back 100% of what you paid.
